smart_goals.description: Maintain systolic blood pressure below 130 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure below 85 mmHg in the next 6 months. Monitor and record blood pressure daily using a home blood pressure monitor for accurate readings.
Reduce LDL cholesterol level to below 100 mg/dL within 3 months. Perform regular cholesterol tests every month to monitor progress and adjust medication and lifestyle changes accordingly.
Maintain daily average glucose intake below 150 mg/dL for the next 3 months. Monitor and record daily glucose intake through food diary and adjust meal plans accordingly.
